values: 收集；采集；聚集；集合；汇集；收藏；搜集；（重新）集中（思想等）；使（自己）镇定下来；收（欠款）；收到；领取；积聚（光、能或热）；募捐；聚积；赢得；获得；（把东西）收拾好；收起来；收走；接走；打起（精神）；鼓起（勇气）；（平面上）积满

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的
可收集的；可回收的（等于collectable）
收集成地；冷静地，镇定地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 主要指把沙、石、煤、草等堆高，不强调整齐。
普通用词，指人或物或抽象事物都可用。侧重于围绕一个中心的集合、聚集。
着重指比较整齐地把东西堆积在一起。
几乎可用于指任何事物量的增加，侧重连续不断地，一点一滴地聚积。
着重大量地积聚，尤指对如金钱、珠宝等有价值东西的大量积聚。
普通用词，多用于指物，侧重指有区别地作选择或有安排有计划地把零散物集中起来。

word_group.brief_definition: 收集邮票；收藏邮票；集邮
打由受话人付款的电话
付费电话；对方付费电话
运费到付；运费待收；到付

bilingual.target: 是的，我收集硬币和纸币。

bilingual.source: What information do you need to collect?

bilingual.target: 收集其他学校的一些宣传册。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are helping Daddy Pig collect sticks for the campfire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪和乔治在帮爸爸收集木柴用来生火 。

yingyinNormal.en: Then what are you worried about? If he works here, you'll be able to keep an eye on him while I do a little digging. Find out how much of this is real. I will need you to collect some DNA samples from the boy. Hair, maybe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你担心什么?只要他在这工作当我调查时你可以监视他，看看真相到底如何？我要你帮忙收集那孩子的DNA样本，头发就行了。

yingyinNormal.en: Must be off. Lots of rubbish to collect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去忙啦。有好多垃圾要清理呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it's a contest. You know, like collect all five.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或者这是一场竞赛, 比如集满五个有奖？

yingyinNormal.en: It is home time. Daddy Pig has come to collect Peppa and Suzy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放学时间到了。猪爸爸来接苏西和佩奇回家。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her friends collect sticks for the camp fire. Wonderful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和朋友们去为篝火烧起树枝了。做得好！

yingyinNormal.en: I need you to arrest them and collect the substance, I'll need it for later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你逮捕他们，并且取回毒品，我之后要用。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Mr. Bull. Hello, everyone. Must be off. Lots of rubbish to collect. Bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，牛先生。你们好啊。我去忙啦。有好多垃圾要清理呢。再见。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry, Peppa. Granny and Grandpa have a little trick to collect the apples.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，佩奇。猪爷爷和猪奶奶摘苹果是有自己的诀窍的。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry, Peppa. Granny and Grandpa have a little trick to collect the apples.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，佩奇。猪爷爷和猪奶奶摘苹果是有自己的诀窍的。

yingyinNormal.en: The parents are here to collect the children. Where am I? Hello. Hello, everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 家长准备来接孩子们回家了。我在哪？你好啊。大家好啊。

yingyinNormal.en: George is going to be the ball boy. He has to collect the ball when it is hit too far.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治要来当球童，当球被打到远处时，他要来捡球。

yingyinNormal.en: Put that down! The only souvenirs we collect here are bloody knuckles and broken bones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放下来，唯一能带走的纪念品是伤的筋和断的骨。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you going to help me collect some apples? Yes, Granny. Oh, the apples are too high up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要和我一起摘苹果吗？是的，奶奶。噢，这些苹果长得太高了。

yingyinNormal.en: Good. In a moment, you will each collect a body bag. You will write your name on that bag.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，一会儿你们每人拿一个运尸袋，写上自己的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: Rebecca Rabbit likes carrots. It is home time. Daddy Pig has come to collect Peppa and Suzy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小兔瑞贝卡喜欢胡萝卜。放学时间到了。猪爸爸来接苏西和佩奇回家。

yingyinNormal.en: Talking of tummies, We should cook supper! Yes! Yes! First, we have to collect sticks to make a fire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说起肚子的话，该做晚餐了 。是的是的 。首先我们得找些木柴来生火 。

yingyinNormal.en: The digester is 14 feet deep, filled with 12 feet of manure, and the top two feet is where those methane gases collect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蒸炼器有14英尺深，装了12英尺的原料，最上面的2英尺就是聚集沼气的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Granny Pig. Ganny Pig. Are you going to help me collect some apples? Yes, Granny. Oh, the apples are too high up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，奶奶。你好，奶奶。要和我一起摘苹果吗？是的，奶奶。噢，这些苹果长得太高了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. I've come to collect Peppa and George. Daddy. You are too early. Oh. Not to worry. You can join in our game. Oh, okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们好啊！我是来接佩奇和乔治回家的。爸爸！你来的也太早了！噢！没事的，来和我们一起玩游戏吧。噢，好的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 收走; 接走; 领取

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 聚集；积聚；集中；收取；领取；一批；一群；学院期初考试；文集；诗集；收藏品
adj. 集体完成的；集体的；共同的；共有的；聚集的；集合的；总的；集体（所有）的
adj. 镇静的；泰然自若的；收集成卷的；受衔的；步态稳健的；全集的；合订的
v. 回忆；追忆；想起；记起；重新收集；再集拢；重新集合；使…镇定下来

word_family.mean: v. 收集；聚集；使集中；取；接；恢复镇定；推断；推论；使以受衔姿势跑；和…互撞；和…发生冲突

sense_info_list.en: bring or gather together things, typically when scattered or widespread

examination_example.sentence: What does the author say about the Victorian portraits he has <highlight>collected</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于他收集的维多利亚时代的肖像，作者说了些什么?

examination_example.sentence: Consumers will be worse off if the industry cannot <highlight>collect</highlight> information about their preferences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果该行业不能收集有关消费者偏好的信息，消费者的处境将更糟。

examination_example.sentence: Facts about the world are waiting to be observed and <highlight>collected</highlight> by objective researchers who use the scientific method to carry out their work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于这个世界的事实正等待客观的研究者去观察和收集。

examination_example.sentence: States can pass laws requiring out-of-state sellers to <highlight>collect</highlight> the state's sales tax from customers and send it to the state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各州可以通过法律，要求外州的销售者从客户那里收取本州的销售税，并将其送到本州。

examination_example.sentence: They usually <highlight>collect</highlight> sales tax on online purchases already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通常已经对网上购物征收销售税了。

examination_example.sentence: The decisions made it more difficult for states to <highlight>collect</highlight> sales tax on certain online purchases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些决定使得各州更难对某些网上购物征收销售税。

sense_info_list.en: call for and take away
sense_info_list.zh: 收走; 接走; 领取

examination_example.sentence: An 84-year-old widow recently emerged from her small, tin-roofed house in Florida to <highlight>collect</highlight> the biggest undivided lottery jackpot in history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位84岁寡居老人最近离开了自己那座位于佛罗里达州的铁皮小房子，去领取历史上最大的单笔彩票头奖。

sense_info_list.en: come together and form a group or mass
solicit and receive donations, especially for charity
(in church use) a short prayer, especially one assigned to a particular day or season
regain control of oneself, typically after a shock

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 聚集；积聚；集中；收取；领取；一批；一群；学院期初考试；文集；诗集；收藏品
adj. 集体完成的；集体的；共同的；共有的；聚集的；集合的；总的；集体（所有）的
n. 收集人；收集物；收集器；收取款项的公务员；地区行政长官；集电极；收藏家；收集者；搜集者

word_family.mean: v. 收集；聚集；使集中；取；接；恢复镇定；推断；推论；使以受衔姿势跑；和…互撞；和…发生冲突

sense_info_list.en: bring or gather together things, typically when scattered or widespread

examination_example.sentence: In one study conducted at an American university, researchers <highlight>collected</highlight> microscopic germs from footwear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国一所大学进行的一项研究中，研究人员从鞋类中收集了微小的细菌。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>collected</highlight> feedback from both employers and employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 收集雇主和雇员的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: More data are <highlight>collected</highlight> and methods for analysis improve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 收集了更多的数据，并改进了分析方法。

sense_info_list.en: come together and form a group or mass

examination_example.sentence: A large number of bacteria <highlight>collected</highlight> on a single shoe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大量的细菌聚集在一只鞋上。

examination_example.sentence: Office carpets <highlight>collected</highlight> more bacteria than elsewhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 办公室地毯比其他地方收集的细菌更多。

examination_example.sentence: They found that up to 421,000 units of bacteria can <highlight>collect</highlight> on the outside of a single shoe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，仅仅一只鞋的鞋面上就可以聚集多达42.1万个细菌单位。

sense_info_list.en: bring together and concentrate one's thoughts
systematically seek and acquire (items of a particular kind) as a hobby
go somewhere and accept or receive something, especially as a right or due
call for and take away

word_usage.usage:
collect表“收集, 聚集”时，不与together连用。
示例：谁收集了这些贝壳?
误 Who collected these shells together?
正 Who collected these shells?

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 几乎可用于指任何事物量的增加, 侧重连续不断地, 一点一滴地聚积。
着重大量地积聚, 尤指对如金钱、珠宝等有价值东西的大量积聚。
普通用词, 多用于指物, 侧重指有区别地作选择或有安排有计划地把零散物集中起来。
普通用词, 指人或物或抽象事物都可用。侧重于围绕一个中心的集合、聚集。
主要指把沙、石、煤、草等堆高, 不强调整齐。通常指把东西杂乱地堆集在一起, 不强调整齐。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 聚集；积聚；集中；收取；领取；一批；一群；学院期初考试；文集；诗集；收藏品
adj. 集体完成的；集体的；共同的；共有的；聚集的；集合的；总的；集体（所有）的
n. 收集人；收集物；收集器；收取款项的公务员；地区行政长官；集电极；收藏家；收集者；搜集者

word_family.mean: v. 收集；聚集；使集中；取；接；恢复镇定；推断；推论；使以受衔姿势跑；和…互撞；和…发生冲突

sense_info_list.en: bring or gather together things; typically when scattered or widespread

examination_example.sentence: A school project of <highlight>collecting</highlight> used books was held last weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周末，学校举行了一次收集旧书的活动。

examination_example.sentence: About 500 used books have found new readers, that 800 have been <highlight>collected</highlight> for the rural school library.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约500本旧书找到了新的读者，其中800本已经被收集到农村学校的图书馆中。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine a world where building the tallest skyscraper wasn't a race of height, but rather one to <highlight>collect</highlight> the most solar energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，这个世界上的摩天大楼不是一场高度竞赛，而是一场收集太阳能多少的较量 。

sense_info_list.en: come together and form a group or mass
call for and take away

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Collect</highlight> the furniture he ordered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把他订的家具运走。

examination_example.sentence: We will send a van to <highlight>collect</highlight> those four and replace them with the Milano you purchased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将派一辆货车来收集这四个，并用你购买的米兰替换它们。

solicit and receive donations; especially for charity

word_usage.usage:
collect表“收集, 聚集”时，不与together连用。
示例：谁收集了这些贝壳?
误 Who collected these shells together?
正 Who collected these shells?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 聚集；积聚；集中；收取；领取；一批；一群；学院期初考试；文集；诗集；收藏品
adj. 集体完成的；集体的；共同的；共有的；聚集的；集合的；总的；集体（所有）的
n. 收集人；收集物；收集器；收取款项的公务员；地区行政长官；集电极；收藏家；收集者；搜集者

word_family.mean: v. 收集；聚集；使集中；取；接；恢复镇定；推断；推论；使以受衔姿势跑；和…互撞；和…发生冲突

sense_info_list.en: bring or gather together things, typically when scattered or widespread

examination_example.sentence: We decided to <highlight>collect</highlight> as many school supplies as possible, and make them into kits—one kit, one child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们决定收集尽可能多的学习用品，并把它们做成文具包，每个孩子人手一个。

examination_example.sentence: The government has <highlight>collected</highlight> money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府已经筹集了资金。

examination_example.sentence: The unwilling parent organizes the meal schedule, sends out emails, and <highlight>collects</highlight> money for end-of-season gifts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不情愿的父母安排用餐时间，发送电子邮件，为季末礼物筹钱。

sense_info_list.en: come together and form a group or mass

examination_example.sentence: Ground water evaporates (蒸发) and <highlight>collects</highlight> on the sheet until small drops of water form fall off into the cup.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地面水蒸发，聚集在板材上，直到形成小水滴，掉到杯子里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 收集; 采集; 收藏

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 聚集；积聚；集中；收取；领取；一批；一群；学院期初考试；文集；诗集；收藏品
adj. 镇静的；泰然自若的；收集成卷的；受衔的；步态稳健的；全集的；合订的

word_family.mean: v. 收集；聚集；使集中；取；接；恢复镇定；推断；推论；使以受衔姿势跑；和…互撞；和…发生冲突

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 收集邮票；收藏邮票；集邮

sense_info_list.en: bring or gather together things, typically when scattered or widespread
sense_info_list.zh: 收集; 采集; 收藏

examination_example.sentence: It has <highlight>collected</highlight> the numbers for the past 16 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它收集了过去16年的数据。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>collected</highlight> them and put them into a glass jar (罐子) patiently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他把它们收集起来，耐心地放进一个玻璃罐子里。

examination_example.sentence: Back in the pioneer days, people grew their own food, caught their own fish, and <highlight>collected</highlight> their own water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在拓荒者时代，人们自己种植食物，自己捕鱼，自己收集水。

sense_info_list.en: solicit and receive donations, especially for charity

examination_example.sentence: Why will the money be <highlight>collected</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么要筹钱？

examination_example.sentence: Who suggests museums should regularly hold special events to <highlight>collect</highlight> money?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁建议博物馆应该定期举办特别活动来筹钱？

examination_example.sentence: Finally he <highlight>collected</highlight> over $2,000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后他筹集了2000多美元。

sense_info_list.en: call for and take away

examination_example.sentence: The museum sent Mr. Chan, a member of the museum staff, to <highlight>collect</highlight> the teapot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 博物馆派员工陈先生去取茶壶。
